biotools.summary: Bayz is a statistical analysis software using Bayesian models. Bayz is a command-line tool that shares similarities with other statistical analysis software such as SAS, R, or Genstat: the general set-up is to import/describe the contents of data files, and then to specify the analysis model to be built in terms of the response variable(s), possible link function and factors or covariates to be fitted.
